src_original: samāhitasya ca na kiñcit phalam anyatra kleśaśodhanād iti /
akṣamasya hi śrutâdau vīryaṃ pratihanyate 'khedasahatvāt /  aśrutavāṃś ca na samādhyupāyaṃ jānāti /
ki.ṃ punar drāghiṣṭhakālâpakāriṣu duṣkhôpāttakuśaladhanalavastainyeṣu narakeṣu nâvadhyaghātakeṣu
asti bhagavan sarvadharmasukhakrānto nāma samādhiḥ /  yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvârambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate /
tatrâpi vikṣepapraśamanânabhiyuktasya cittaṃ na samādhīyatae iti /
